login.please_enter_no: Please enter your mobile number to login
login.otp_sent_to: OTP will be sent to this number
login.wrong_number: This seems like a wrong number
login.type_otp_text: Now type in the OTP sent to you for authentication
login.resend_otp_text: Type in the OTP that has been resent to your mobile number
login.welcome_desc: Let us quickly get to know you so that we can get you the best help :)
login.multi_signup_desc: We have found 1 account registered with this mobile number. Please tell us who is who? :)
login.incorrect_otp_message: You seem to have entered an incorrect OTP 3 times.
login.best_general_physicians_text: Here are our best General Physicians
login.callback: You can request a call back for us to resolve your issue ASAP

to the patient..

you :)
